name: Rhea
description: Rhea is a game created during a 2016 game jam in Glasgow as part of the Transmango project. It is a somewhat abstract game with imagery depicting a growing population and the need to sustain it. Gameplay surrounds the attempts to sustain this growing population for as long as possible. This game was presented alongside others from a series of game jams across Europe, to industry stakeholders for environmental research at a science conference in Leuven, Belgium.
